parameterItems.label: ALL ON active, ALL OFF active
ALL ON is not active ALL OFF is not active

parameters.label: Activate / deactivate functions ALL ON/ALL OFF
Automatic turning off output Q1 after set time
Automatic turning on output Q1 after set time

Automatic turning on output Q2 after set time
Automatic turning off/on seconds or miliseconds selection

parameterItems.label: Flush 2 relays module saves its state before power failure (it returns to the last position saved before a power failure)
Flush 2 relays module does not save the state after a power failure, it returns to off position.

parameters.label: Saving the state of the 2 relays after a power failure
Power reporting in Watts on power change for Q1

parameterItems.label: When system is turned off the output is 0V (NC)
